ygData.subject: Re: building a better pole
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello. Im new to this list and rarely play my gnome, but it appears to me that if I was to make a colapsable fishing pole, I d tryusing something other than a
ygData.messageBody:
Hello. Im new to this list and rarely play my gnome, but it appears to me
that if I was to make a colapsable fishing pole, I'd tryusing something
other than a normal pole.. maybe 2 or 3 rods instead? It just seems (to me
anyway) that that would be the way to go. Do we know for sure that it
requires a fishing pole? I'd be out there in a second combining poles and
wire and stuff, but I am so broke its not funny ;p
riceball@...
-------------------
Lindell the Monk, Ragak the Troll Shaman, Hain the Halfling Warrior (all
veeshan)
